attributes.additional_details:
Coles Mill Viaduct in Holsworthy Devon, could and should form an important part of the Ruby Way cycle route.

Over the past 10 years there have been promises of funding that have come to nothing, and numerous council discussions that have led nowhere.

It would be nothing short of a disaster to allow this historic architectural asset to fall further into a state of neglect.

It could be one of the highlights of the ever growing UK cycle infrastructure, and something Holsworthy could be proud of. The economic benefits from a fully completed Ruby Way would be immense, not only for  Holsworthy, but the region in general.

Please support this petition!
